About CleanSite 🌿

CleanSite is a modern Bootstrap project showcasing creativity, responsiveness, and clean design.

🌟 Our Mission

To create a unique, clean, and responsive design that recruiters will notice.

👩‍💻 Technologies

Built using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap with gradients and smooth animations.
